stories.text:
See part 1: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=29518891

Long story short, after talking with them, two months later they redirect https://cds.ihsmarkit.com/markit.jsp -> https://ihsmarkit.com/products/pricing-data-cds.html

So my worries because of their aquisition by S&P Global have came true again… lol

And people wonder why i'm so bullish for on-chain derivatives… it's because of shit like this…
